column1: #Text=On Monday a meeting of the Subscribers of the intended Kailroad between Hath and Bristol, took place.
#Text=The utility of railroads was pointed out by Mr.
#Text=Tucker afterwards read his report of the plan of the intended railroad, which was received with much satisfaction by the meeting.

#Text=After some discussion it was agreed that Proprietors of four shares should have one vote for every such four shares ; but that no proprietor should have more titan 25 voles, let him hold what number of shares he might.
#Text=Berkeley whilst hunting, on Tuesday, received a severe contusion on the knee, which has confined him to the Casde.
#Text=Ihe population of Cheltenham may be estimated at nearly go.ltoo.
#Text=Jn the census taken in 1821, the return was hi,iff(B.
#Text=Since that period not less than JOO additional houses have been assessed to the poor-rates.
#Text=Upwards of 500 houses are now building, and as many more arc in contemplation.
